snippet: IBM and U.S.C. have teamed up to try to gauge the public sentiment toward the players heading into the Super Bowl, using Facebook and Twitter to provide the data.
abstract: IBM and U.S.C. have teamed up to try to gauge the public sentiment toward the players heading into the Super Bowl, using Facebook and Twitter to provide the data.
lead_paragraph: Football players love to talk about heart and how it can't be measured. As it currently stands, IBM may only be a few years away from having the technology to change that.
